title: Famous Grouse
author: Famous Grouse
content: The bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning May I just advice not to celebrate too early, we are not yet in the bull run. Maybe we are just waking up this last quarter or at last this last 2 months. But we are still a long way to go before we can actually see what a real bull run is.I'm not familiar with the coins you are shilling, but regardless, you just need to be very careful.And if you think you have made a lot of money (it looks you are before you seems to be very happy), then it's better to take your profit and not to be greedy and wait for more, in my opinion.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Don't be overwhelmed. I don't want to cut your joy and fun but don't be too overexcited with what's happening in the market.Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMHappy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning Good on you and congratulations, so don't forget to take your profits. But I'm thinking that this is more of a shill on that exchange that I've never heard of before.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: My advice is do not hesitate to take profit because there will be some corrections anyway even if we are going to be in a uptrend for a while, do not sit on your profits and just stare at the dollar value, take some profits.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: This is not a complete bull run I don't see any signs of it now but watch out the market is still not in good condition the price could go down anytime because this is still a phase where the bearishness continues even though there are many who say in November there is a little brightness for the market but I still not sure about altcoins going to explode.Well it's true if you already have an advantage in altcoins then immediately take it, I'm afraid when there is full hope but in the end the token goes down again and is difficult to recover.

comments.author: Maidak
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning I want to remind you that this is not yet a real bull season, just a short-term bull run in the crypto winter. So don't get so excited that we forget what is our main mission in this market, taking profits is never wrong and the money in the wallet is really our money. Just have money to have an opportunity, don't be too greedy, expect too high lest you regret it.Bitcoin has passed $21k but I'm still not really excited because I know this is just another of the many traps of this bear season.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning Good for you. I saw my Matic having the pump time and made me sell some amount to take the profit and still hodl the rest But I am not sure if the altcoins season is coming soon, but I still hope it will come this month or next. Although not many altcoins can rise higher like their ATH but it is enough to take profit in this situation. Now, I am still waiting for the other altcoins; hopefully, more altcoins in my bag can increase.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Sell your altcoins take profit before it will be going down again. The hype that comes to the polygon caused by meta has been adopting it. This is not a bullrun but a small recovery by bitcoin that can trigger everything. The fact that if the pump will never last long. It will be going back again as bitcoin time will be over. The bitcoin's recovery is also helping some major coins to be pumped so hard. A small pump in bitcoin can trigger the price of token. I can imagine when bitcoin will be getting a big bullrun and this will be so crazy to see that whole of altcoins will be going to the moon. My portfolios were also increasing more than 10% this day. I have been stocking more and more altcoins as a preparation for the next recovery phase. Crypto may get more adoption very soon. More world class companies will be starting to pay more attention to the crypto

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning Have you done take profit? if you haven't and are happy just because your asset has increased in value in USD then your pleasure will disappear instantly because crypto changes so quickly, so don't be so happy before you take profit, before you execute your trade then you are still likely to be disappointed because the price can drop far below your bought price and there you will be stressed seeing your portfolio

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning I don't want to be such a kill vibe individual, but I have to tell you, don't get too excited, Your joy can quickly turn to sadness. Unrealistic optimism and over excitement can result in wrong decision making, be careful. The market remains very unpredictable. Your coins are pumping right now don't mean that they will keep pumping. Don't get your eyes off observing them.

comments.author: NNRR
comments.body: I can't find any logical reason why you should be happy so soon because the market is not going to start full bull run now only Alt some coin market movement is showing full bull run still you have to be careful because market is going to see a big crash. Maybe because after this correction I'm hopeful you'll see a proper bull run.

comments.author: Fullcoinese
comments.body: The little pump going on I think is too much if you consider it Bull Run. the market situation is still not looking good. even Bitcoin after being pumped back down.I predict at least until the end of this year, Bitcoin will not move too far from its current price. and its impact on the altcoin market. bear season is not over yet, the market is trying to gather stronger support to make a better trend before the bull season.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning I also feel happy seeing those coins like Doge that I tried holding on to months ago. Glad to see it fly after all. Maybe we really had hit the rough rock bottom of the market.Crypto holders speculate there will be dumps after the FOMC announcement, but there is an opposite reaction to crypto instead while the stocks did the expected.

comments.author: Reid
comments.body: Not just the coin you mentioned. The market is so green like is has been watered healthy by investors. It's joyful to see someone this happy even for just a little bump up. This doesn't happen a lot of times. Most buyers are expecting more, and they won't be too happy with this short pumps. If you think the profits is enough, then do sell, or take ROI if you feel like there's more that will be left after you do it. You don't when the market will twist again as a lot of investors are looking forward for this time to come. They could be selling as we talk about it.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning Never head of that project. But optimism seems to be working good, as long as their development and expansion to more dapps progress.I invested some on OP when it was 0.80 and ripping some of the goods profits. Maybe it can reach $2 utmost but checking the chart there would be some flow.

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: never lose your happiness. But during this period, your happiness may remain in your crop. Because in this period, the ups and downs can be very small and sudden. I recommend you to follow the market very well and especially to follow the news around the world. Because as I said, we are at the beginning of the bear season and a new bull season has not started, so stay tuned for your investments.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning Don’t want to ruin your momentum but I can tell that this is not a bull run yet and we are still far from that level. We might already see a little pump but that is not enough to call it a bull trend. Lower your expectation for now because we have to break a lot of resistance before the bull happened. Though its good to see altcoins catching up with the market, those who will survive the bear will have a better chance of making their new all time high again, take profit when necessary.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. ALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning It doesn't look like a bull run, but more like a bullish correction. You need a big surge in volume across the whole market, not just a few coins, for a true bull run to occur. Some coins are starting to show growth, and that's a good thing, but I wouldn't call it a bull run. People tend to call any short-term momentum a bullrun and think it's the start of something big. I have seen such bullrun joys in the spring and summer of this year.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: I am honestly stunned that so many people answering in here that they know that bull run has not started, when in the fact you people just don't know if it has started and that was the bottom.It's like when the bear run started: Everyone was sure that this is not the bear run, it's merely a dip, and that we should buy that dip. No one seemed to see it was bear run until they lost at least half of their porfolio, and even then almost everyone unanimously said that holding is the best option, or that we should buy more now. Some of these people lost 70% some 90%. And NOW they are afraid to buy when they would get 90% discount from their bags. They won't buy because it could drop another 90%, i understand that perfectly. But when someone is making money and is happy about it somehow he gets greeted with "i got bad news for you", i get weirded out.Wasn't the old advice from Buffet that "Be greedy when others are fearful'". I guess for me it's time to be greedy because i see so many people being afraid now. I admit that i don't know if bear run has ended, but i sense the fear for this being sucker's run so i am one of the bulls now.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMThe bull run is here. I wouldn't call this is a bull run mate, although the price has been going up, it's not a definition of bull run.Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 05, 2022, 07:03:01 AMALTCOINS are going to blow up soon.. Happy to see some of my alts I bought on FAMEEX are just pumping. Matic and optimism just making me smile this morning Yes, we would like for altcoins to grow, like the coins that you mentioned, or in the top 10. But then again, as majority here says, you don't get to be very excited.We still have a long way to go before we can see a true bull run. And that will only happen after the bitcoin halving in 2024 as we all know that this activity is the final catalyst for the bull run that you are talking about.
